Articles.Content:
I made thumbnails for a series on Youtube, and I want you guys' opinion on them! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![9f6ihJc.png](http://i.imgur.com/9f6ihJc.png)

![piDxL4r.png](http://i.imgur.com/piDxL4r.png)

![pMZY757.png](http://i.imgur.com/pMZY757.png)

This looks cool.

EDIT: Oh, you lost your channel because of the minecrafters! That is sad.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-01T22:22:32Z" title="05/01/2015 10:22  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 1, 2015</time> by RAINCRAFTER**

> 
> This looks cool.
> EDIT: Oh, you lost your channel because of the minecrafters! That is sad.

Well, I didn't lose it, I chose to restart. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Nice thumbnails, but one thing that you have to remember is that YouTube scales them down to 640x360, so try doing that (not permanently) in an image editing program and see how they look.

-Carlpilot ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
